Description.Name: Drive Upgrades
Description.Details: The Argo reactors and engines are quite remarkable and they can generate more thrust and power than I realized. By investing in a major upgrade to the core reactor and optimizing more subsystems we can increase thrust and power efficiency to get the Argo up to full power. Upgrading the drive engines will increase drive output by 40%

AssignedCastDescription: The Argo's drive repairs have gone well, but I know I can squeeze more out of her. Unfortunately, crew morale may suffer because they will complain more with having less downtime from the faster travel.
